newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Japan asks Bangladesh to speed up aid utilisation.
newsitem.headline: Japan asks Bangladesh to speed up aid utilisation.

text.p: Japan, one of Bangladesh's main aid donors, on Wednesday warned that the flow of assistance would slow down unless the country speeded up implementation of development projects.
"...The utilisation of Japanese assistance has not made any progress during the last two years," Shuichiro Megata, a senior Japanese government official told newsmen.

Megata, who is heading a six-member official delegation to an annual "consultation" with Bangladeshi officials on future aid, said Bangladesh needed to resolve the problems hindering the utilisation of annual aid.
